summary: Odahviing retexture, better suiting his name, with glow details.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBE1E0]
[img]http://orig03.deviantart.net/a591/f/2016/035/5/1/odahheader_by_versispellis-d9qj1x6.png[/img]


[img]http://orig14.deviantart.net/e9f2/f/2016/009/8/5/about_by_versispellis-d9nahnv.png[/img]

I was inspired for this one.  I wish I had the skills to change his
power set to frost in the spirit of his new namesake appearance.
I was thinking about blue raspberry popsicles. . . .

~ Tools: Adobe Photoshop CS6 + Nifscope 2.0

~ 2k textures adapted from the high res DLC

~ Raspberry coloration and new scale patterns

~ Detailed glowmap 

~ Compatible with anything

~ No scripts or .esp /.esm

~ Takes up no space in load order

~ Performance friendly

~ Safe to uninstall at any time

~ Appearance may vary depending on ENB settings


[img]http://orig12.deviantart.net/ee0b/f/2016/009/2/a/rec_by_versispellis-d9nahno.png[/img]

author: Versispellis
